title: COVERING PRISONS
description: This tipsheet provides guidance to journalists on how to cover prisons and jails, including tips on persuasive arguments when approaching an editor, routine requests for documents and data, digging into a story, communicating with inmates and staff, dealing with agency pushback, and maximizing impact.
